name: Pixel Puzzles Trivia
description:
Learn fun and interesting facts and test your memory skills with the Pixel Puzzles question questing trivia game.

Taking the classic trivia format and gamifying it to a whole new level. Collect stars, gain XP, and quiz your way through the ranks to reach the 'All-Knowing' epic genius level.

Play solo, versus a friend, or in a group with the trivia board game designed for multiple players to test their wits against one another.

The INFINITE QUIZ mode will keep your inquisitive journey going indefinitely as you collect Diamonds & Gold and take your place on the leaderboard as the one with the most loot and correct answers.

Check back every day for the DAILY QUESTION to gain extra XP and build up a streak bonus for each consecutive day.

  • 12 game modes
  • XP & level progression
  • Collect stars by completing objectives
  • Hint token system
  • Stack gold & diamonds
  • Many question categories
  • 50-250 questions per category
  • Customization
  • 3 difficulty levels
